miniaesdemo

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniaesdemo.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object

    This class contains helper methods used in the MiniAES calculations.

    Since:
    0.1

        Returns:

      • stringArrayToIntArray

        public static int[] stringArrayToIntArray(java.lang.String[] stringToConvert)

        This method converts a String Array to Integer Array that has the same length.

        Parameters:
        stringToConvert - A String Array of four elements.
        Returns:
        Returns an Integer Array of four elements.

      • formatBinaryString

        public static java.lang.String formatBinaryString(java.lang.String binaryString)

        This method formats a 4-bit binary string to add padding such that the string is always of length four.

        Parameters:
        binaryString - A 4-bit binary String.
        Returns:
        Returns a padded 4-bit binary String.

      • stringArrayToString

        public static java.lang.String stringArrayToString(java.lang.String[] stringArrayToConvert)

        This method converts a String Array to String.

        Parameters:
        stringArrayToConvert - A String Array of four elements.
        Returns:
        Returns a 16-bit binary string.

      • segmentAndPadData

        public static int[][] segmentAndPadData(java.lang.String inputData)

        This method segments input data and pads it before its sent for encryption it. See MiniAES.EncryptText(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.

        Parameters:
        inputData - A string containing the input data provided by the user.
        Returns:
        Returns an Integer Matrix of the input data split into rows of 4 characters, the last one may contain padding.

      • segmentData

        public static int[][] segmentData(int[] inputData)

        This method segments input data before its sent for decryption it. See MiniAES.EncryptText(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.

        Parameters:
        inputData - An integer array containing the input data provided by the user.
        Returns:
        Returns an Integer Matrix of the input data split into rows of 4 characters.

      • removePadding

        public static int[] removePadding(int[] paddedInput)

        This method removes the padding from the last segment of the input data before its. See MiniAES.DecryptText(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.

        Parameters:
        paddedInput - An integer array containing the last segment of the input which might contain padding.
        Returns:
        Returns an Integer matrix of the input data with the padding removed from it.

      • printLogo

        public static void printLogo()

        This method displays Team Caligula's ascii logo. Crafted by Petar Baltov.
